website_summaries.verdict: A spacious model at a budget-friendly price – a solid value.
pros: Has an unbeatable price for  a sturdy design with space for 20 pairs of shoes
Fits everything from sneakers to high heels to boots
cons: It's a little more challenging to assemble than others we considered, but considering the value, this isn't a major concern

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra $10 and buy a sturdy one. It does the job but if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra $10 and buy a sturdy one. It does the job but if you don't pay attention to the weight of your shoes it will make it unbalance and the bars will fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Rohanok

customer_reviews.title: Nice large shoe rack meets all our needs
customer_reviews.text: Nice large shoe rack meets all our needs. Fairly easy to put together alone but would be easier with two people. It is light weight and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Not for the impatient. Flimsy to put together. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not for the impatient. Flimsy to put together. Didn't stay together when moved to my closet, pain to put BACK together. Will work for what I need but if you can find something else, go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Kalista

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a million pieces. The instructions were small pictures but somehow we got this together. Kind of flimsy but serves its purpose and holds a great amount of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: FranBill

customer_reviews.title: Great Rack
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. Easy to put together, sturdy, holds a lot of pairs and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S Walk

customer_reviews.title: Off the floor
customer_reviews.text: This is a little flimsy, but so far it has worked just fine. We have it against a wall and it doesn't get knocked around, so for us it's good. Easy to put together and inexpensive and a great space saver
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, cheap, miserable shoe rack
customer_reviews.text: This shoe rack is a nightmare. It’s a complete piece of crap. It’s forever collapsing and in need of being rebuilt. Save your money and buy something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Chidi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and works perfect for my closet!
customer_reviews.author: Maddi C

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bit flimsy, It was really easy to assemble. I'll give it five stars anyway... Just what I needed, ashoe rack to organize our shoes in the mud room area. No complaints....
customer_reviews.author: Khelenaamor

customer_reviews.title: easy put together!
customer_reviews.text: super easy to put together! holds right under 20 pairs of my boyfriends size 10-10.5 shoes (boots, dress shoes, tennis)
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: It was missing a pole so i couldnt build it , and one of the long poles was bend....sucks for me
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H

customer_reviews.title: This shoe rack is a piece of crap. I've had to put it back together about ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe rack is a piece of crap. I've had to put it back together about 5 times. Finally am giving up and buying a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Tess Watt

customer_reviews.title: which i really love! I had a bit of trouble putting everything ...
customer_reviews.text: I was able to fit 22 pairs of shoes instead of 20, which i really love! I had a bit of trouble putting everything together, and i ended up bending one of the bars a little bit because i wanted to make sure that the pole was completely in the hole.There has been no problem with the shoe rack besides me accidentally bending the pole. The rack is by our door and gets hit a lot, but has not damaged or come apart! I really like this product and am thinking of buying another rack in the future! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: DON'T ORDER THIS UNLESS YOU KNOW IT's IN ORIGINAL PACKAGING
customer_reviews.text: SOO disappointed ... received the item with parts missing ... guessing since the box was taped up that someone had ordered it and returned it without the two 230 long bars. There were supposed to be 12, but the box only had 10 .... too late to return it so guess I'm stuck with a defective item.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi

customer_reviews.title: Its very bad design; its not holding up together
customer_reviews.text: Its very bad design ; its not holding up together . not stable and its always falls down when we put shoes.not happy with this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect, I used for my shoes so they won't ...
customer_reviews.text: fits perfect, I used for my shoes so they won't fall every time someone hits it. I love that the levels are completely horizontal.
customer_reviews.author: MAG

customer_reviews.title: Took me 15 minutes to put it together (I'm slow) and it looks great! Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today. Took me 15 minutes to put it together (I'm slow) and it looks great! Very sturdy. I have no doubt it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Sanjabi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, looks nice and subtle. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Northrup

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Shoes slide right off, no matter the type of grip on the bottom. Totally useless
customer_reviews.author: Sam E

customer_reviews.title: 20 pair shoe rack
customer_reviews.text: This shoe rack was exactly what I needed. It was very easy to construct.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Witham

customer_reviews.title: Easily mounted.
customer_reviews.text: Can hold up to 24 pairs of adult shoes.Easily mounted.
customer_reviews.author: RMB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what I want it to do, and it was very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This serves its purpose. It was somewhat clumsy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
